exec: // Do not send HTTP Headers with empty variables, as Postman will send the literal variable name
// Do not send HTTP URL Query Parameters with empty variables, as Postman will send the literal variable name

header.description: The access token which can be copied from your Experience Platform integration, prefixed with "Bearer ". For more information on how to obtain this value, visit the [authentication tutorial](http://www.adobe.com/go/platform-api-authentication-en).

The API key which can be copied from your Experience Platform integration. For more information on how to obtain this value, visit the [authentication tutorial](http://www.adobe.com/go/platform-api-authentication-en).

The IMS Organization ID which can be copied from your Experience Platform integration. For more information on how to obtain this value, visit the [authentication tutorial](http://www.adobe.com/go/platform-api-authentication-en).
The name of the sandbox in which the operation will take place. See the [sandboxes overview](https://adobe.com/go/sandbox-overview-en) for more information.

item.name: Create a new batch in Catalog Service.
